title: Sign up to earm hotel rewards
text:
IHG Priority Club Rewards 
With the traditional Holiday Inn backbone hotels for business travelers, IHG is a hotel company that most business travelers have probably stayed with at some point or another. In addition to the Holiday Inns, though, IHG has trendy modern brands like Hotel indigo and longer-stay hotels like Staybridge Suites. 
IHG Priority Club Rewards perks include: Free Internet, quick advance to Elite membership by staying at three IHG brands, rewards nights count toward next membership level, rollover nightsâ€”extra nights for Platinum level roll over to next year, no blackout dates, faster rewards through combination of points and cash, redeem points for flights, and more. 
Expiration details: IHG Priority Club Rewards points will expire after 12 months of inactivity.
